channel.title: Multiple clan chat entries? PI 317
channel.description:
Sometimes there will be multiple instances of the same player in the clan chat, but a sort of nulled version. The player will receive double, sometimes triple clan chat messages because of this. The problem is I don't know how it's caused because it seems to happen randomly, or when the server disconnects?
I've made sure that all players are removed from the chat and the channel is cleaned when the player logs out yet it still happens.
Does anyone know the cause of this so I can fix it?
Much appreciated.

item.title: Multiple clan chat entries? PI 317
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I’m assuming your channel entrance logic is flawed, a hacky fix would be to remove duplicates each time a new user joins or leaves.

Read full topic
